languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смеется — жутким, надломленным смехом.{/n} "Что это? Шанс открыть разлом в варп в самом сердце бастиона наших врагов? Я не думал, что что-то в этом проклятом месте сможет меня обрадовать. Я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смеется — жутким, надломленным смехом.{/n} "Что это? Шанс открыть разлом в варп в самом сердце бастиона наших врагов? Я не думал, что что-то в этом проклятом месте сможет меня обрадовать. Я ошибался".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смеется — жутким, надломленным смехом.{/n} "Что это? Шанс открыть разлом в варп в самом сердце бастиона наших врагов? Я не думал, что что-то в этом проклятом месте сможет меня обрадовать. Я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds unhealthy and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of the bastion of our enemies? I didn't think anything in this damned place could make me glad. I was mistaken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds unhealthy and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of the bastion of our enemies? I didn't think anything in this damned place could make me glad. I was mistaken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to be able to make me glad. I was wrong."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to be able to make me glad. I was wrong."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix éclate de rire, mais de façon morbide et perturbante.{/n} « Qu'avons-nous là ? Une chance d'ouvrir une brèche dans le Warp en plein cœur du bastion de nos ennemis ? Je ne m'attendais pas à trouver de quoi me réjouir dans ce lieu de perdition. J'avais tort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix éclate de rire, mais de façon morbide et perturbante.{/n} « Qu'avons-nous là ? Une chance d'ouvrir une brèche dans le Warp en plein cœur du bastion de nos ennemis ? Je ne m'attendais pas à trouver la moindre nouvelle réconfortante dans ce lieu de perdition. J'avais tort. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希大笑起来，但他的笑声带着疯狂的意味，令人不安。{/n}“这是什么意思？有机会在敌人的巢穴中心撕开亚空间的裂口，对吗？我本以为这个被诅咒的地方不会有什么令我开心的事情，看来是我错了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希大笑起来，但他的笑声带着疯狂的意味，令人不安。{/n}“这是什么意思？有机会在敌人的堡垒中心撕开一块亚空间的裂口吗？我本以为这个该死的地方不会有什么令人开心的事情，看来是我错了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは笑ったが、その笑い声は病的で不穏なものに聞こえる。{/n}「これはあれか？敵の掩蔽壕の中心に<歪み>の亀裂を開くチャンスということか？こんな忌々しい場所で、笑みを浮かべることができるとは思っていなかったよ。我が間違っていた」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは笑ったが、その笑い声は病的で不穏なものに聞こえる。{/n}「これはあれか？敵の掩蔽壕の中心に<歪み>の亀裂を開くチャンスということか？こんな忌々しい場所で、笑みを浮かべることができるとは思っていなかったよ。我が間違っていた」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht, aber sein Lachen klingt krank und verstörend.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was das bedeutet? Wir haben die Chance, einen Warpriss im Herzen der Bastion unserer Feinde zu öffnen? Wer hätte gedacht, dass es an diesem verdammten Ort irgendetwas geben würde, das mir ein Grinsen ins Gesicht zaubert? Ich habe mich wohl geirrt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lacht, aber sein Lachen klingt krank und verstörend.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was das bedeutet? Wir haben die Chance, einen Warpriss im Herzen der Bastion unserer Feinde zu öffnen? Wer hätte gedacht, dass es an diesem verdammten Ort irgendetwas geben würde, das mir Freude verschafft? Ich habe mich wohl geirrt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ríe, pero su carcajada es cruel y turbadora.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Una oportunidad de abrir una brecha en la disformidad en el corazón del mismísimo bastión de nuestros enemigos? Creí que en este lugar maldito no podía haber nada que me hiciera sonreír. Me equivocaba».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ríe, pero su carcajada es cruel y turbadora.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¿Una oportunidad de abrir una brecha en la disformidad en el corazón del mismísimo bastión de nuestros enemigos? Creí que en este lugar maldito no podía haber nada que me llenase de dicha. Me equivocaba».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, dehşet verici ve rahatsız edici bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Ne yani? Düşmanın kalesinin göbeğinde bir öteboyut yarığı açma fırsatımız mı var? Bu kahrolası yerde yüzüme gülümseme konduracak bir şey duymayı beklemiyordum. Ne yanılmışım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs, but his laughter sounds morbid and disturbing.{/n} "What's this? A chance to open a warp breach in the heart of our enemies' bastion? I did not expect anything in this damned place to put a smile on my face. I was wrong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gülüyor ancak gülüşü dehşet verici ve rahatsız edici.{/n} "Ne yani? Bu, düşmanlarımızın kalesinin tam kalbinde bir öteboyut yarığı açma fırsatı mı? Bu kahrolası yerde yüzüme bir gülümseme konduracak bir şey duymayı beklemiyordum. Yanılmışım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
